'''Daniel Robert Middleton''' (born November 8, 1991), better known by his online pseudonyms '''DanTDM''' and '''The Diamond Minecart''', is an English [[YouTube]]r known for creating showcases of [[mods]]. His videos feature an assortment of different characters, including a [[villager]] scientist named [[Dr. Trayaurus]] and a [[Earth:Skeleton Wolf|skeleton wolf]] named Grim.

Due to his popularity within the community, he has collaborated with [[Mojang Studios]] several times, most notably playing a fictionalized version of himself in {{MCSM}}.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
=== ''Minecraft: Story Mode'' ===
{{Main|Story Mode:Dan The Diamond Minecart}}
Within the game, he portrays himself in the episode ''{{MCSM|A Portal to Mystery}}'', alongside several other popular creators. His character becomes intertwined with a series of murders connected to the villain the {{MCSM|White Pumpkin}}, where his role in the story can change depending on the player's choices.

=== Minecon ===
Prior to that, he hosted an exclusive [[GREAT LONDON ROBBERY!!|episode]] of his [https://dantdm.fandom.com/wiki/Custom_Mod_Adventure Custom Mod Adventures] series at [[MINECON 2015|''MINECON 2015'']].<ref>{{YouTube link|bJ8oeIZBzw8|Minecraft {{!}} GREAT LONDON ROBBERY!! {{!}} Custom Mod Adventure LIVE @ Minecon 2015!!|DanTDM|July 9, 2015}}</ref> He has also made appearances in a Blockbench demonstration at [[Minecraft Live 2022|''Minecraft Live 2022'']] and the pre-show for [[Minecraft Live 2024|''Minecraft Live 2024'']], the latter of which he later reviewed on his channel.<ref>{{YouTube link|kE0PJJlhDFA|Minecraft Live 2022: Create Your Own Mob with Blockbench!|Minecraft|October 22, 2022|t=2m16s}}</ref><ref>{{YouTube link|gQvDRq897SU|What Did I Think Of Minecraft Live 2024?|DanTDM|September 30, 2024}}</ref>

=== ''A Minecraft Movie'' ===
In 2025, he made a cameo appearance in {{AMCM}} alongside several other creators as {{AMCM|auction attendees}} at an auction for {{AMCM|Steve}}'s belongings, which leads to {{AMCM|Garrett Garrison}} discovering the {{AMCM|Earth Cube}}.<ref> {{Tweet|dantdm|1906422949349097623|I‚ÄôM IN THE MINECRAFT MOVIE üò≠<br>See if you can spot us when you go see it!<br>The premiere was today and it‚Äôs such a fun movie.<br>Extremely grateful to be given this opportunity, thank you to Warner Bros, Mojang and everyone else who made it happen üôèüèª}} </ref><ref>{{YouTube link|ESTmx5zsUE4|I'M IN THE MINECRAFT MOVIE|DanTDM|April 2, 2025}}</ref> Prior to officially being confirmed to appear, he and his co-stars alluded to being in New Zealand during filming.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|dantdm|C46HJpLLuB3|New Zealand was a dream ‚ò∫Ô∏è|March 25, 2024}}</ref><ref>{{Cite Instagram|aphmau_|C49iAECMcso|Got to visit Hobbiton! üíú Such a fun trip to New Zealand with @dantdm @ldshadowlady @officialmumbo and @valkyrae! Such awesome folks! Need to take more pics with ya next time Rae! ü•πüíú|March 25, 2024}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Although he has worked with Mojang Studios several times, he has also created media with his characters unaffiliated with ''Minecraft'', most notably ''{{Wikipedia|Trayaurus and the Enchanted Crystal}}''.
** Similarly, the vinyl figure company [[Youtooz]] has produced a figure of him stylized after [https://freddy-fazbears-pizza.fandom.com/wiki/Glamrock_Freddy Glamrock Freddy], a character from another video game franchise he associates with, ''{{Wikipedia|Five Nights at Freddy's}}''.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://youtooz.com/products/glamrocktdm?srsltid=AfmBOorIYbvU-5Gms99azMPZY9ueq6rw_Yk1-IVMpYJ8mg7JvF49Q3ml|title=GlamrockTDM|website=Youtooz Collectibles}}</ref>
* Prior to officially working with Mojang, Dan participated in a contest to create a video promoting [[Java Edition 1.3.1]].<ref>{{YouTube link|VQ0UhHccYYE|Minecraft 1.3 Commercial - Mojang Contest Winner!|DanTDM|July 31, 2012}}</ref> His video would end up winning, becoming featured in [[The Weekly Chunk]].
